pages.text: The Vindicator Talisman provides 50% increased damage for one hit after switching tools every 30 seconds.  The crafting recipe requires an $(l:fargostalismans:talisman_base_normal)Normal Talisman Base$(/l).  The talisman is used to craft the $(l:fargostalismans:force_of_rejectors)Force of Rejectors$(/l).
